Reviews.Title: stickers are peeling off and are sun-faded
Reviews.Author: juan
Reviews.Content: they are OK if they are not exposed to the weather, but the ones exposed to rain and sun are peeling, and have turned orange/yellow, they are hard to see now.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!!!
Reviews.Author: spk
Reviews.Content: High qaulity stickers gets the point across thats for sure will recommend to everyone great price as well buy it you wont regret it

Reviews.Title: Photo does not match sticker sent
Reviews.Author: Boater
Reviews.Content: The stickers that arrived were not the same as those shown in the photo. The stickers that arrived were in an unprotected business envelope and include a faux website address at the bottom of the sticker that was not shown in the advertising photo.

ProductInfo.Features:
These Decals can be applied to any smooth surface
These signs are your first line of defense against criminals
This is the quick, easy way to warn criminals that they are being watched
Easily posted and removed
